text: The Little Foxes is a 1941 American drama movie directed by William Wyler and was based on the 1939 play of the same name by Lillian Hellman. It stars Bette Davis, Herbert Marshall, Teresa Wright, Richard Carlson, Dan Duryea, Patricia Collinge, Charles Dingle, Jessica Grayson, Russell Hicks and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. It was nominated for 9 Academy Awards in 1942. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1941 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by William Wyler
title: The Little Foxes
